title: Crochet hearts, stars, snowflakes
description:
About the collection
====================

This is my collection of decorative crochet motifs: hearts, stars, snowflakes.
The ISBN is from one leaflet in this collection, just to get you a nice picture to look at, but it's only one of the numerous goodies that you'll find by downloading it! 
There are leaflets, books, single patterns downloaded or copy pasted from the web, all collected here, so you don't have to search around

Uses
====
Use them if you need to make thread tree ornaments, bunting or decorate your house and gifts on Valentine's day. 
You can also use those motifs to decorate clothes, hats, handbags or whatever you like, either crocheted or otherwise. You can even make heart potholders (be sure to use pure cotton: make two and sandwitch a piece of flannel between them) or snowflake/star coasters, or join the stars/ snowflakes to make a lacy shawl or curtain. Using a thin thread and starching them afterwards you can even make these motifs as a pendant or earrings. The possibilities are endless!
